projects.name: EduSpark - Web App
projects.description: Developed full stack MERN application Ed Tech Learning Management System. Integrated DRM encryption using Video Cipher to protect course content and ensure secure delivery of videos. Developed authentication system with automated OTP activation via email for user verification process. Built an admin dashboard featuring real-time analytics, efficient management of course categories, banners. Implemented notifications and dynamic FAQs to improve user support and engagement.

projects.name: E-Mart Web Application
projects.description: Developed fully functional e-commerce website using a MVT architecture with Django and PostgresSQL database. Implemented CRUD functionality for product and add to cart and User Authentication system. Designed & Implemented REST API using Django REST Framework with a real-time PayPal payment integration.

projects.name: Pneumonia Detection - Image Analysis
projects.description: Developed an AI-based pneumonia X-Ray image detection system using deep learning technique. Trained a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model on chest X-ray images to classify pneumonia. Build Back-end Flask web app & Deployed on Render, allowing seamless image upload for the classification.

experiences.description: Built & deployed a Simple Restaurant Website with CRUD & authentication system using Django, SQLite3 and JS.
